textContent:
---Confidence---

It's been a few days since I last wrote an entry, and although there's different reasons for that, the main one is that its because I've become more and more comfortable and confident with you, Rei. To the point where, whenever I think of something sweet and cute about you, I want to instantly tell you about them and learn about your reactions about them. 

But more than that, I want you to know about them. I want you to be aware of how much I like you. Of how much I miss you. Of how much I enjoy talking to you. 

It just feels right to tell you about my feelings, Rei. Its just like a matter of fact. Just as how the sky is blue to our eyes, just as how the earth is round, my feelings for you are so absolute that simply not stating them everyday feels wrong.

---Your Voice---

We've also started calling each other lately!!! I really really really like the sound of your voice!! Hearing your voice soothers my heart (kahit na di naman pagod puso ko kase lagi mo pinapasaya hehe)! 

I dream of the day where I get to hear it everyday, Rei. I want to get used to the sound of your voice. And even then, I'll still continue to like it. 

I want to hear you when you're happy. I want to hear you when you're sad. I want to hear you to hear you expressing every single emotion you can give, Rei.

---I miss you a lot---

I don't know if this needs to be said (kase feel ko super obvious siya), but I really do miss you a lot. By a lot, I mean like, frequently. I really did not think it possible to miss someone who you are currently talking to. I don't know why. I do enjoy the feeling though. Masokista ba ko HAHAHAHA. Pero, for me, it's just another proof that I like you. The fact that a person as flawed as me, can get to miss and like someone like you, is a really wonderful gift. I'll cherish you Rei.

---Nurse Rei Saves The World---

You always tell me to save the world whenever I start working and I really really do appreciate it!! I really find those messages of yours heartwarming and cute and sweet and it just makes the butterflies in my stomach flutter. 

But really though, you're the real superhero. You're the real deal. You have a very very hard and tiring job and you tough it out every single day. You save lives Rei. On behalf of your patients, thank you for doing such a noble and wonderful thing. 

And as much as I'd like to also tell you to save the world, ayaw ko. Kase character trait mo na yon, yoko nakawin AHAHAHAHA. Sayo lang dapat yon hahaha. It's one of the things that I'll always like about you. 

Pero just this one time, save the world, Rei! So that we get to actualize the future we dream for each other.
title: January 14, 2024
textContentHtml:
---Confidence---


It's been a few days since I last wrote an entry, and although there's different reasons for that, the main one is that its because I've become more and more comfortable and confident with you, Rei. To the point where, whenever I think of something sweet and cute about you, I want to instantly tell you about them and learn about your reactions about them. 


But more than that, I want you to know about them. I want you to be aware of how much I like you. Of how much I miss you. Of how much I enjoy talking to you. 


It just feels right to tell you about my feelings, Rei. Its just like a matter of fact. Just as how the sky is blue to our eyes, just as how the earth is round, my feelings for you are so absolute that simply not stating them everyday feels wrong.


---Your Voice---


We've also started calling each other lately!!! I really really really like the sound of your voice!! Hearing your voice soothers my heart (kahit na di naman pagod puso ko kase lagi mo pinapasaya hehe)! 


I dream of the day where I get to hear it everyday, Rei. I want to get used to the sound of your voice. And even then, I'll still continue to like it. 


I want to hear you when you're happy. I want to hear you when you're sad. I want to hear you to hear you expressing every single emotion you can give, Rei.


---I miss you a lot---


I don't know if this needs to be said (kase feel ko super obvious siya), but I really do miss you a lot. By a lot, I mean like, frequently. I really did not think it possible to miss someone who you are currently talking to. I don't know why. I do enjoy the feeling though. Masokista ba ko HAHAHAHA. Pero, for me, it's just another proof that I like you. The fact that a person as flawed as me, can get to miss and like someone like you, is a really wonderful gift. I'll cherish you Rei.


---Nurse Rei Saves The World---


You always tell me to save the world whenever I start working and I really really do appreciate it!! I really find those messages of yours heartwarming and cute and sweet and it just makes the butterflies in my stomach flutter. 


But really though, you're the real superhero. You're the real deal. You have a very very hard and tiring job and you tough it out every single day. You save lives Rei. On behalf of your patients, thank you for doing such a noble and wonderful thing. 


And as much as I'd like to also tell you to save the world, ayaw ko. Kase character trait mo na yon, yoko nakawin AHAHAHAHA. Sayo lang dapat yon hahaha. It's one of the things that I'll always like about you. 


Pero just this one time, save the world, Rei! So that we get to actualize the future we dream for each other.
